text: 🇺🇦💥 Did you know that Ukraine's defence is at risk due to lack of funding? 🤯 The Senate bill might not be enough to ensure Kyiv's military aid. 💰 Nato's Jens Stoltenberg proposed a 5-year, 100bn euro package to support Ukraine's military. 🇺🇸🤝 But, will it be enough? 🤔 Ukraine's president warns that without US aid, they might lose the war. ���avy The Pentagon plans to allocate $14bn for new weapons. 💪 What do you think? Can Nato and the US work together to support Ukraine's defence? 🤔
